episodes.title: The Cult of the Real Housewife: Mary Scamdalene
episodes.description: This week we're discussing the TLC docuseries "The Cult of the Real Housewife." This doc centers around Mary Cosby, of "The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City" fame, and her controversial church, Faith Temple Pentecostal. And baybeeee, our girl puts the "Christ" in Christian Dior! From allegedly demanding astronomical tithes from her congregants, to marrying her step-grandfather (because her grandmother insisted on it??), Mary's life has been under intense scrutiny since RHOSLC premiered. But nothing has loomed larger than the accusations that her church is a cult and its members view Mary as God. Through interviews with relatives & former church members, and actual audio & video clips from church services, this docuseries attempts to shine a light on the [allegedly] harmful nature of Faith Temple Pentecostal Church, and the ministry of Mary and Robert Cosby, Sr. "The Cult of the Real Housewife" is available to stream on HBOMax.
